name: Olivie (Russian Potato Salad)
author: petitchameau
summary: A Russian and Eastern European potato salad; one version of it at least! Best served cold with some good bread!
ingredients: 2 large potatoes, peeled and sliced lengthwise
3  dill pickles, chopped, or more to taste
directions: Place potatoes and carrots into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water until cold
Combine potatoes, carrots, sweet peas, pickles, onion, bologna, and eggs together in a large bowl
Stir mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, and black pepper gently into potato mixture until well combined
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until cold, at least 30 minutes
